Why Less Mess recommends

HiBar makes a range of shampoo and conditioner bars with all the ingredients you'd expect to see in those products, but without the water and plastic bottles. The unique bar shape makes them easy to hold and stand on a soap dish. Get refills on subscription or as one-off purchases.

We're a work in progress

This site doesn't take any fees or payment for recommendations, it's simply a list of products and services we know work well for normal people who just want to make Less Mess in the world.
